name: Cillian
description: A small, black cat with a white spot on its chest. It has a small, silver bell around its neck.

name: Outus
description: A medium sized, brown owl with large, golden eyes.

name: Kovum
description: A two headed demon dog with black fur and red eyes. It seems scary, but it's actually quite friendly.

name: Slimy
description: A small slime creature that can change its shape and color at will.

name: Necro
description: An undead raven that can speak and has a dark sense of humor.

name: Fluffy
description: A large, fluffy rabbit with a horn on its forehead. It's a bit clumsy, but it's very loyal.
